ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed low fat cream of chicken and herbs soup
ingredients.normalizedName: Cream of Chicken and Herb Soup

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

cookingTips: Cut chicken into uniform strips for even cooking
Cook on low for 4-5 hours to keep chicken tender and moist
Stir gently halfway through cooking to distribute sauce evenly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the benefit of using condensed soup as a base for this slow cooker dish?
